attributes.action: Stop using and remove the word "Islamic" to title the terrorist group Daesh.
attributes.background: Daesh, the terrorist group also known as "Islamic State" (IS) or "Islamic State and the Levant" (ISIL) or "Islamic State of Iraq and Syria" (ISIS). In any way, the word Islamic is being used to title this Insidious Satanic group. As such, Islam is being tarnished as a religion of peace and humanity.
